Summary: A small round, silver object at about 2mile elevation
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around June 24th 2012
divs: sighting detailsat about 2:52pm sunday june 24, 2012 i was looking at the sky from backyard toward the south. i noticed a round object about 6-7 miles south possibly over western queen creek\southern chandler coming toward me at about 2 miles elevation. first i thought it's a helicopter but it was flying too high for a helicopter & as it got closer to about 3-4 miles of me, possibly over baseline & country-club i noticed its round shape kind of like a golden\silver ball. as it reached about 60 degree angle over my head it suddenly started ascending until i couldn't see it anymore, at the last moment it was over 7-8 miles above the ground. the whole time i could see it was no more than 25-35 seconds.
